00081 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00082 {
00083         
00084 @protected
00085         /* our chipmunk space! */
00086         cpSpace                 *_space;
00087         
00088         /* Internal devices (dev: Consider revamping) */
00089         NSMutableArray  *_invocations;
00090 
00091         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00092         cpShape                 *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00093         
00094         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00095         int             _steps;
00096         
00097         /* The dt used last within step */
00098         cpFloat _lastDt;
00099         
00100         /* If constant dt used, then this accumulates left over */
00101         cpFloat _timeAccumulator;
00102                 
00103         /* Options:
00104                 -cleanupBodyDependencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00105                 -constraintCleanupDelegate is the delegate that will be called when the above variable is true
00106                 xxxx-iterateStatic will call _iterateFunc on static shapes
00107                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00108                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00109                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00110         */
00111         BOOL                                                    _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00112         id<cpConstraintCleanupDelegate> _constraintCleanupDelegate;
00113         //BOOL                                                  _iterateStatic;
00114         BOOL                                                    _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00115         smgrIterateFunc                 _iterateFunc;
00116     smgrEachFunc                    _eachFunc;
00117         cpFloat                                                 _constantDt;
00118 }
00119
